bilingual.target: 他分享了一个有效的学习攻略。

bilingual.source: We need a more effective education policy.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个更有效的教育政策。

bilingual.source: Effective comm is crucial for remote teams.
bilingual.target: 对于远程团队来说，有效的通信至关重要。

bilingual.source: Exercise is an effective form of catharsis.
bilingual.target: 运动是一种有效的宣泄方式。

bilingual.source: Effective hrp can help reduce turnover rates.
bilingual.target: 有效的人力资源规划可以帮助减少员工流失率。

bilingual.source: Activated carbon is a very effective adsorbent.
bilingual.target: 活性炭是一种非常有效的吸附剂。
有效的训练可以提高工作表现。

bilingual.source: Effective comms are essential for remote teams.
bilingual.target: 对于远程团队来说，有效的通讯至关重要。

bilingual.source: Accurate data is crucial for effective planning.
bilingual.target: 准确的数据对于有效的规划至关重要。
有效的危机管理可以减少损失。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not an effective way? What other way would you...
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是有效的方式？那你们还有什么其他方式...

yingyinNormal.en: This was the most effective way I discovered for making great decisions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我发现的做出好决策的最有效的方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Taking a long walk. Good, down. And then there's the one that's proved most effective: sex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长时间散步。很好，没问题。根据证实最有效的方法就是做爱。

yingyinNormal.en: It's more effective to use our capabilities to help partners on the ground secure their own country's futures.
yingyinNormal.zh: 利用我们的军事优势帮助我们的盟友在地面保护他们自己国家的安全是更有效的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Your humanity is cost-effective. So is your suffering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的人性很节省成本，你的受难也一样。

yingyinNormal.en: The Golden Eagle, one of the world's most effective birds of prey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 金雕是世界上最有力的猛禽之一。

yingyinNormal.en: And it just so happens that when you take effective amounts of MDMA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以当我们吃摇头丸到一定的量这些细胞就会被启动。

yingyinNormal.en: Where did you get those? Billing is not an effective way to determine work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们从哪儿拿来的？账单并不是决定工作时长的有效方式。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. All right. Who can tell me the properties of an effective roar? Yes?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，谁能告诉我有效吼叫的特性？请说。

yingyinNormal.en: So you know it's bad? No, I know it's an effective piece of propaganda. That's all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你觉得很糟？不，我知道这样宣传效果会很好，仅此而已。

yingyinNormal.en: You've been an outstanding deputy, Jackie. Far more effective than your more seasoned colleagues.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一直是一位出色的副手 Jackie，比你那些老练的同事们还高效。

yingyinNormal.en: In related news, doctors say the Night Howlers' antidote is proving effective in rehabilitating the afflicted predators.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另外，医生宣称午夜嚎叫的解药已让受害食肉动物逐渐恢复。

yingyinNormal.en: This guy could be not just the best pitcher in our bullpen, but one of the most effective relief pitchers in all baseball.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他不仅会成为我们队里最佳的候援投手，在整个棒球界也会大放异彩。

yingyinNormal.en: Having said that, air drying your hands can be effective if done thoroughly, and truthfully, you don't always have an option.
yingyinNormal.zh: 话说回来，别无选择时，用烘手机还是可以有效地清除手上细菌。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, they're things you can do. Just some home remedies, but in my experience I've found that some of them are quite effective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上你可以用这些方法在家做治疗，根据我的经验，我发现有些方法很有效。

yingyinNormal.en: It was obviously effective. Leonard grew up to be an experimental physicist. Perhaps if she'd also denied him Christmas, he'd be a little better at it. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然易见，这是正确的，莱纳德长大后，现在是一位实验物理学家，也许如果她还不让他过圣诞节，他还会更出色些。谢谢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is not yet clear how much more <highlight>effective</highlight> airline security has become — but the lines are obvious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还不清楚航空公司的安全措施有多有效，但（排队）队伍是显而易见的。

examination_example.sentence: That's about as <highlight>effective</highlight> as brushing dirt under a carpet and can even make us ill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就像在地毯下刷灰尘一样有效，甚至会让我们生病。

examination_example.sentence: Stop laughing: it's not just cost <highlight>effective</highlight> but helps you balance your diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 别笑了：这不仅是有成本效率的，还能帮你平衡饮食。

word_usage.usage:
表示“有效的”
effective指有效用的或能产生预期效果的，可用于人或事物。
effectual指产生希望或想要的结果的，只用于事物，如举措、药物、对策等。
efficient既可指人也可指事物，强调不浪费时间、金钱、能源等的。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调效用，意为“有效的”，可用于人或事物。
强调效果，意为“（最终）奏效的”，一般不用于人。
强调效验，意为“灵验的”，不用于人，多表示药物和治疗的效果。
强调功效，意为“有成效的、效率高的”，可用于人和事，指人表示“能干的”，指方法、机器表示“收效大的”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

sense_info_list.en: producing or capable of producing an intended result or having a striking effect
sense_info_list.zh: 有效的; 产生预期结果的

examination_example.sentence: If your model of reality is wildly different from the actual world, then you struggle to take <highlight>effective</highlight> actions each day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的现实模式与现实世界大不相同，那么你每天都很难采取有效的行动。

examination_example.sentence: Some companies are realizing that placing the burden of recycling entirely on the consumer is not an <highlight>effective</highlight> strategy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些企业意识到，把回收利用以减少浪费的负担全推给消费者并非有效之举。

examination_example.sentence: The results highlight the need to develop <highlight>effective</highlight> early interventions for educators to encourage positive peer relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些结果突显了形成有效的早期干预措施的必要性，以让教育工作者鼓励积极的同伴关系。

sense_info_list.en: existing in fact; assessed according to actual rather than face value

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Effectively</highlight>, the ban will include the registration of new cars in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，该禁令将包括该国的新车登记。

sense_info_list.en: doing something well and thoroughly with no waste of time, money, or energy
sense_info_list.zh: 效率高的; 有功效的

examination_example.sentence: I sincerely hope that those who assert that automation will make us more <highlight>effective</highlight> and pave the way for new occupations are right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真诚地希望那些断言自动化将使我们更加高效并为新职业铺平道路的人是正确的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Effective</highlight> Friday, Screen Actors Guild-American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) has declared a strike against 11 video game publishers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从星期五开始生效，美国电影演员协会和广播电视艺术家联合会(SAG-AFTRA)宣布对11家电子游戏发行商进行罢工。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 常用以指物, 强调能产生某种预期的效果。如：effective medicine, effective method 等。
"效率高的", "有能力的", 用以指人或物, 着重有效地利用时间、精力并取得预期效果。如：The German telephone system is highly efficient. (德国的电话系统效率很高。)

sense_info_list.en: producing or capable of producing an intended result or having a striking effect
sense_info_list.zh: 有效的; 产生预期结果的

examination_example.sentence: High-protein breakfasts have been found particularly <highlight>effective</highlight> in reducing the longing for food and consumption later in the day, according to research by the Australian Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 澳大利亚的联邦科学与工业研究组织的研究发现，蛋白质含量丰富的早餐，对于降低当天随后时间的食欲及减少食物摄取量，特别有效。

examination_example.sentence: The study looked at computer-assisted cognitive (认知的) behavioral therapy (CBT) and found that it was no more <highlight>effective</highlight> in treating depression than the usual care patients receive from a primary care doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对计算机辅助认知行为疗法研究后发现，与主治医生提供的常规护理相比，该疗法在治疗抑郁症方面效果并不显著。

examination_example.sentence: Traditional CBT is considered an <highlight>effective</highlight> form of talk therapy for depression, helping people challenge negative thoughts and change the way they think in order to change their mood and behaviors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 传统的认知行为疗法(CBT)是有效治疗抑郁症的一种谈话疗法，帮助患者与消极思维作斗争，改变他们的思维方式，从而改善情绪和行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: While they sound efficient and cost-saving, a recent study reports that they are not <highlight>effective</highlight>, primarily because depressed patients are not likely to engage with them or stick with them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些线上项目听起来既高效又节省成本，但最近的一项研究表明事实并非如此，主要因为抑郁症患者不太可能配合参与或者一直坚持下去。

sense_info_list.en: doing something well and thoroughly with no waste of time; money; or energy
sense_info_list.zh: 效率高的; 有功效的

examination_example.sentence: Take <highlight>effective</highlight> measures to raise productivity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 采取有效措施提高生产率。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 常用以指物，强调能产生某种预期的效果。如：effective medicine，effective method 等。
"效率高的"，"有能力的"，用以指人或物，着重有效地利用时间、精力并取得预期效果。如：The German telephone system is highly efficient. (德国的电话系统效率很高。)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 结果；作用；影响；效果；财产；财物；程度；效力；感受

examination_example.sentence: We will be holding a free taster session on 23rd May, at 10 am, to demonstrate the variety of <highlight>effective</highlight> and active exercises.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将于5月23日上午10点举行免费试听课，展示各种有效和积极的练习。

examination_example.sentence: Language researchers say pronunciation and fluency are the biggest barriers, followed by grammar in <highlight>effective</highlight> spoken English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言研究人员表示，在有效口语中，发音和流利是最大的障碍，其次才是语法。

examination_example.sentence: Some light showers have been forecast since last month, but all of them have been <highlight>effective</highlight> in surrounding areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从上个月开始，天气预报就预测会有一些小雨，但是这些预测只在周边地区应验了。
